card.name: "Krenko Is Forever"
card.text: Whenever "Krenko Is Forever" attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens, where X is its power.

card.name: Ahn-Crop Invader
card.text: As long as it's your turn, Ahn-Crop Invader has first strike. {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Ahn-Crop Invader gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Ajani's Pridemate
card.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

card.name: Ajani, the Greathearted
card.text: Creatures you control have vigilance. +1: You gain 3 life. -2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control.

card.name: Angrath's Rampage
card.text: Choose one— • Target player sacrifices an artifact. • Target player sacrifices a creature. • Target player sacrifices a planeswalker.

card.name: Angrath, Captain of Chaos
card.text: Creatures you control have menace. -2: Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

card.name: Arlinn's Wolf
card.text: Arlinn's Wolf can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Arlinn, Voice of the Pack
card.text: Each creature you control that's a Wolf or Werewolf enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. -2: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

card.name: Augur of Bolas
card.text: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Bolas's Citadel
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may play the top card of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its converted mana cost rather than pay its mana cost. {T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

card.name: Burning Prophet
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Burning Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn, then scry 1.

card.name: Cruel Celebrant
card.text: Whenever Cruel Celebrant or another creature or planeswalker you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Crush Dissent
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

card.name: Davriel's Shadowfugue
card.text: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life.

card.name: Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage deals 2 damage to them. -1: Target player discards a card.

card.name: Deathsprout
card.text: Destroy target creature. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Dovin's Veto
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Counter target noncreature spell.

card.name: Dreadhorde Arcanist
card.text: Trample Whenever Dreadhorde Arcanist attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost less than or equal to Dreadhorde Arcanist's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Dreadhorde Butcher
card.text: Haste Whenever Dreadhorde Butcher deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Dreadhorde Butcher. When Dreadhorde Butcher dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

card.name: Dreadhorde Invasion
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Emergence Zone
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Emergence Zone: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash.

card.name: Erratic Visionary
card.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Eternal Taskmaster
card.text: Eternal Taskmaster enters the battlefield tapped. Whenever Eternal Taskmaster attacks, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Fblthp, the Lost
card.text: When Fblthp, the Lost enters the battlefield, draw a card. If it entered from your library or was cast from your library, draw two cards instead. When Fblthp becomes the target of a spell, shuffle Fblthp into its owner's library.

card.name: Flux Channeler
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Giant Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Gideon's Triumph
card.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature that attacked or blocked this turn. If you control a Gideon planeswalker, that player sacrifices two of those creatures instead.

card.name: Gleaming Overseer
card.text: When Gleaming Overseer enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) Zombie tokens you control have hexproof and menace.

card.name: God-Pharaoh's Statue
card.text: Spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast. At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Grim Initiate
card.text: First strike When Grim Initiate dies, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

card.name: Herald of the Dreadhorde
card.text: When Herald of the Dreadhorde dies, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

card.name: Honor the God-Pharaoh
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards. Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

card.name: Ignite the Beacon
card.text: Search your library for up to two planeswalker cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Interplanar Beacon
card.text: Whenever you cast a planeswalker spell, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add two mana of different colors. Spend this mana only to cast planeswalker spells.

card.name: Invade the City
card.text: Amass X, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

card.name: Invading Manticore
card.text: When Invading Manticore enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

card.name: Jace, Wielder of Mysteries
card.text: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead. +1: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Draw a card. -8: Draw seven cards. Then if your library has no cards in it, you win the game.

card.name: Jiang Yanggu, Wildcrafter
card.text: Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has "{T}: Add one mana of any color." -1: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Karn's Bastion
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Kaya's Ghostform
card.text: Enchant creature or planeswalker you control When enchanted permanent dies or is put into exile, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Kaya, Bane of the Dead
card.text: Your opponents and permanents your opponents control with hexproof can be the target of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof. -3: Exile target creature.

card.name: Kiora's Dambreaker
card.text: When Kiora's Dambreaker enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each a counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner
card.text: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card. -1: Untap target permanent.

card.name: Lazotep Plating
card.text: Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Lazotep Reaver
card.text: When Lazotep Reaver enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

card.name: Leyline Prowler
card.text: Deathtouch, lifelink {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Liliana's Triumph
card.text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.

card.name: Liliana, Dreadhorde General
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card. +1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. -4: Each player sacrifices two creatures. -9: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control of each permanent type and sacrifices the rest.

card.name: Mowu, Loyal Companion
card.text: Trample, vigilance If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on Mowu, Loyal Companion, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

card.name: Nahiri's Stoneblades
card.text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Nahiri, Storm of Stone
card.text: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control have first strike and equip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate. -X: Nahiri, Storm of Stone deals X damage to target tapped creature.

card.name: Neheb, Dreadhorde Champion
card.text: Trample Whenever Neheb, Dreadhorde Champion deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may discard any number of cards. If you do, draw that many cards and add that much {R}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

card.name: No Escape
card.text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. Scry 1.

card.name: Ob Nixilis's Cruelty
card.text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted
card.text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted deals 1 damage to that player. -2: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.

card.name: Paradise Druid
card.text: Paradise Druid has hexproof as long as it's untapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Ravnica at War
card.text: Exile all multicolored permanents.

card.name: Relentless Advance
card.text: Amass 3. (Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

card.name: Rising Populace
card.text: Whenever another creature or planeswalker you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rising Populace.

card.name: Samut's Sprint
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

card.name: Samut, Tyrant Smasher
card.text: Creatures you control have haste. -1: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

card.name: Single Combat
card.text: Each player chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then sacrifices the rest. Players can't cast creature or planeswalker spells until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Sorin's Thirst
card.text: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord
card.text: As long as it's your turn, creatures and planeswalkers you control have lifelink. +2: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. -X: Return target creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a Vampire in addition to its other types.

card.name: Storrev, Devkarin Lich
card.text: Trample Whenever Storrev, Devkarin Lich deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, return to your hand target creature or planeswalker card in your graveyard that wasn't put there this combat.

card.name: Teferi's Time Twist
card.text: Exile target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If it enters the battlefield as a creature, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Teferi, Time Raveler
card.text: Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery. +1: Until your next turn, you may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. -3: Return up to one target artifact, creature, or enchantment to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Teyo's Lightshield
card.text: When Teyo's Lightshield enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Teyo, the Shieldmage
card.text: You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) -2: Create a 0/3 white Wall creature token with defender.

card.name: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge
card.text: Creature and planeswalker spells you cast have affinity for artifacts. +2: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of artifacts you control. You gain X life. -3: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. -8: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Put all artifact cards from among them onto the battlefield.

card.name: The Wanderer
card.text: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to you and other permanents you control. -2: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Tibalt's Rager
card.text: When Tibalt's Rager dies, it deals 1 damage to any target. {1}{R}: Tibalt's Rager gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Tibalt, Rakish Instigator
card.text: Your opponents can't gain life. -2: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "Whenever this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

card.name: Time Wipe
card.text: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.

card.name: Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves
card.text: When Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves enters the battlefield, create Voja, Friend to Elves, a legendary 3/3 green and white Wolf Creature token. Whenever a Wolf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life and you may have that creature fight up to one target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Totally Lost
card.text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Vivien's Arkbow
card.text: {X}, {T}, Discard a card: Look at the top X cards of your library. You may put a creature card with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Vivien's Grizzly
card.text: {3}{G}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature or planeswalker card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, put it on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Vivien, Champion of the Wilds
card.text: You may cast creature spells as though they had flash. +1: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gains vigilance and reach. -2: Look at the top three cards of your library. Exile one face down and put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. For as long as it remains exiled, you may look at that card and you may cast it if it's a creature card.

card.name: Vraska's Finisher
card.text: When Vraska's Finisher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Vraska, Swarm's Eminence
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. -2: Create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker."

card.name: Wanderer's Strike
card.text: Exile target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Widespread Brutality
card.text: Amass 2, then the Army you amassed deals damage equal to its power to each non-Army creature. (To amass 2, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
